channel.title: cat-Journey on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-Journey on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer BH00009GRA in English
item.description: I have risen this morning by Thy grace, O my God, and left my home trusting wholly in Thee, and committing myself to Thy care. Send down, then, upon me, out of the heaven of Thy mercy, a blessing from Thy side, and enable me to return home in safety even as Thou didst enable me to set out under Thy protection with my thoughts fixed steadfastly upon Thee. There is none other God but Thee, the One, the Incomparable, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise.

item.title: Prayer BH00009GRA in Papiamentu
item.description: *I have risen this morning by Thy grace Mi a lanta awe mainta pa fabor di Bo grasia, O mi Dios, i a laga mi kas konfiando henteramente den Bo, i rekomendando mi mes na Bo kuido. Basha anto riba mi for di e shelu de Bo miserikordia un bendishon di Bo, i permitimi di bolbe mi kas sano i salbo, meskos ku Bo a permitimi di sali bou Bo protekshon ku mi pensamentunan fih√° firmemente riba Bo.

item.title: Prayer BH10688 in English
item.description: O God, my God! I have set out from my home, holding fast unto the cord of Thy love, and I have committed myself wholly to Thy care and Thy protection. I entreat Thee by Thy power through which Thou didst protect Thy loved ones from the wayward and the perverse, and from every contumacious oppressor, and every wicked doer who hath strayed far from Thee, to keep me safe by Thy bounty and Thy grace.
